# Eclipses, Syzygy, and Temporal Windows

Classical texts emphasize eclipse windows and syzygy as periods of heightened instability [@surya_siddhanta; @varahamihira_brihat_samhita].

## Syzygy

- **New Moon (Amavasya)**: $Tithi = 30$
- **Full Moon (Purnima)**: $Tithi = 15$

## Eclipse Proxy

We flag eclipse windows when syzygy coincides with proximity to lunar nodes (Rahu/Ketu):

$$
\min(|\lambda_{Moon}-\lambda_{Rahu}|, |\lambda_{Moon}-\lambda_{Ketu}|) \leq 12^\circ
$$

## Windows

All combinations are evaluated in time windows: **0, ±1, ±3, ±7, ±14, ±30 days**.
